content.question: The figure shows a vector <math alttext="A B with rightwards arrow on top"><mover><mrow><mi>A</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow><mo>→</mo></mover></math> in the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane. Which of the following represents the vector as <math alttext="open angle brackets x comma y close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> components?

choices.label: <math alttext="open angle brackets negative 4 comma 3 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open angle brackets negative 3 comma 4 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open angle brackets 2 comma negative 2 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open angle brackets 3 comma negative 4 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open angle brackets 3 comma negative 4 close angle brackets"><mfenced close=">" open="<"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
